lcSingleSelect.lcQuestion: When a <step> element is the referencing element in a conref (that is, it contains the conref attribute) what must be true? (choose one):

lcAnswerOption.lcAnswerContent: The referencing <step> element can contain step content.
The <cmd> element within the referencing <step> element can contain content.
The <cmd> element is not required within the referencing <step> element.
An empty <cmd> element is required, even though the referencing <step> element is replaced when the conref is resolved.

lcSingleSelect.lcFeedbackIncorrect: The referencing <step> element must contain an empty <cmd> element, because the <cmd> element is required. A topic must be valid, even before conrefs are resolved.
